CustomField.description: The country component of the jurisdiction (e.g., "United States"). This is not necessary if more specific rules are applied. For example, if you have a rule that includes a City of "Austin" and a State of "Texas", then you do not need to specify a country.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The country component of the jurisdiction (e.g., "United States"). This is not necessary if more specific rules are applied.
CustomField.label: Country
